means: 大叫，大喊( bawl的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: One of the toddlers was bawling, and the other had a runny nose.
sentence.Network_cn: 其中一个学步的小孩在大哭，另外一个流着鼻涕。

sentence.Network_en: He tried to direct the video like a fashion show, bawling instructions to the girls.
sentence.Network_cn: 他导演那段录像时大声地指挥着那些女孩子，好像在搞一场时装表演似的。

sentence.Network_en: We heard the dulcet tones of the sergeant, bawling at us to get on parade.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们听到中士用“悦耳”的声音向我们大喊,让我们跟上队伍.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The baby bawling all night ., 婴儿整夜啼哭.
That baby has been bawling for hours ., 那婴儿已经大声哭叫了几小时.

list.abs: > + 叫喊 Bawl out> 我们的降生,都带着自己嘹亮的叫喊。这是我们向这世界发出的第一次警告。这是我们是胜利着的。因为我们的探索换来了光明。> 而以后呢.
basket case 过渡紧张/精神将要崩溃bawl out 碰钉子bean pole 高佬
bawl的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... bewray 泄露, 暴露... bawl about 叫卖 bawl and squall 怪喊怪叫.
bawl at sb ., 对某人吆喝.
The sergeant bawled commands ., 军曹大声发布命令.

entry.def: If you bawl, you shout in a very loud voice, for example because you are angry or you want people to hear you.

example.ex: When I came back to the hotel Laura and Peter were shouting and bawling at each other...
example.tran: 我回到旅馆的时候，劳拉和彼得正互相叫嚷着。

example.ex: Then a voice bawled: 'Lay off! I'll kill you, you little rascal!'...
example.tran: 然后一个声音大叫道：“赶紧停下！我会杀了你的，你这个小流氓！”

entry.def: If you say that a child is bawling, you are annoyed because it is crying loudly.

example.ex: One of the toddlers was bawling, and the other had a runny nose.
example.tran: 其中一个学步的小孩在大哭，另外一个流着鼻涕。

example.en: President Truman on Tuesday dealt the new Czechoslovak Ambassador a first class bawling out.
example.zh: 杜鲁门总统星期二给了捷克斯洛伐克新任大使最严厉的谴责。

auth_sentence.content: They all scattered in fright, bawling for their mas.
auth_sentence.res_content: They all scattered in fright, bawling for their mas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They all scattered in fright, bawling for their mas.

auth_sentence.content: She hears the cow bawling before she can see it.
auth_sentence.res_content: She hears the cow bawling before she can see it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She hears the cow bawling before she can see it.

auth_sentence.content: I was bawling again, even though I knew what was coming.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was bawling again, even though I knew what was coming.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was bawling again, even though I knew what was coming.
